movies.overview: A grandfather decides to launch a childcare business alongside a bitter divorcee who is also an aging game show icon trying to make a comeback.
movies.title: Start Me Up

movies.original_title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
movies.overview: When young priest Jud Duplenticy is sent to assist charismatic firebrand Monsignor Jefferson Wicks, it’s clear that all is not well in the pews. After a sudden and seemingly impossible murder rocks the town, the lack of an obvious suspect prompts local police chief Geraldine Scott to join forces with renowned detective Benoit Blanc to unravel a mystery that defies all logic.
movies.title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery

movies.overview: A musical version of the classic story of the mean spirited Grinch who plots to steal Christmas from Whoville.
movies.title: Dr. Seuss' The Grinch Musical

movies.overview: When a raging flood traps a researcher and her young son, a call to a crucial mission puts their escape — and the future of humanity — on the line.
movies.tagline: The last day on earth. The one choice for survival.
movies.title: The Great Flood

movies.overview: When K-pop superstars Rumi, Mira and Zoey aren't selling out stadiums, they're using their secret powers to protect their fans from supernatural threats.
movies.tagline: They sing. They dance. They battle demons.
movies.title: KPop Demon Hunters

movies.original_title: Evil Influencer: The Jodi Hildebrandt Story
movies.overview: Unravel the case of Utah therapist Jodi Hildebrandt, whose child abuse arrest with parenting YouTuber Ruby Franke exposed a twisted tale of manipulation.
movies.title: Evil Influencer: The Jodi Hildebrandt Story

movies.overview: When an American family is invited to spend the weekend at the idyllic country estate of a charming British family they befriended on vacation, what begins as a dream holiday soon warps into a snarled psychological nightmare.
movies.title: Speak No Evil

movies.overview: Straight-arrow policewoman Cooper is excited and thrilled about her next assignment. Her task is to escort Daniella Riva, a wisecracking Colombian beauty, from San Antonio to Dallas so both she and her husband can testify against a drug lord. Plans go awry when Mr. Riva gets ambushed, leaving Daniella a widow. Cooper and her witness must now use their wits to escape from crooked cops and murderous gunmen, while not killing each other in the process.
movies.title: Hot Pursuit

movies.overview: Four siblings' lives change drastically when their ailing mother takes a turn for the worse over the holiday season.
movies.tagline: A good goodbye... It's all that matters.
movies.title: Goodbye June

movies.overview: Four animal friends get a taste of the wild life when they break out of captivity at the Central Park Zoo and wash ashore on the island of Madagascar.
movies.tagline: They weren't born in the wild... They were shipped there.
movies.title: Madagascar

last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter Eight: The Rightside Up
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Vecna prepares to destroy the world as we know it, the party must put everything on the line to defeat him once and for all.

tv_shows.name: Stranger Things
tv_shows.overview: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Strange things are afoot in Hawkins, Indiana, where a young boy's sudden disappearance unearths a young girl with otherworldly powers.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 2
seasons.overview: It's been nearly a year since Will's strange disappearance. But life's hardly back to normal in Hawkins. Not even close.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 3
seasons.overview: Budding romance. A brand-new mall. And rabid rats running toward danger. It's the summer of 1985 in Hawkins ... and one summer can change everything.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 4
seasons.overview: Darkness returns to Hawkins just in time for spring break, igniting fresh terror, disturbing memories — and an ominous new threat.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 5
seasons.overview: The fall of 1987. Hawkins is scarred by rifts. Vecna has vanished and the government has placed the town under military quarantine, forcing Eleven back into hiding. To end this nightmare, they'll need everyone together, one last time.

last_episode_to_air.name: It Stays with Us
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the police close in on the Shining Haven, missing pieces fall into place and hidden truths come to light — but some threaten to stay buried forever.

tv_shows.name: Run Away
tv_shows.overview: A desperate father searching for his runaway daughter gets caught up in a murder case — and stumbles upon secrets which could destroy his family for good.
tv_shows.tagline: How far will you go to bring her back?

last_episode_to_air.name: Veni, Vidi, Venezia
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the sink-or-swim chaos of Venice Fashion Week, Emily scrambles to hit a high-water mark. Back in Paris, the agency faces a tidal wave of its own.

tv_shows.name: Emily in Paris
tv_shows.overview: New passions. New fashions. New Emily? A plucky American marketing whiz spreads her wings in life and love after landing her dream job in Paris.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After landing her dream job in Paris, Chicago marketing exec Emily Cooper embraces her adventurous new life while juggling work, friends and romance.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: More fun. More fashion. More faux pas. As Emily finds her footing in Paris, the fallout from a night of passion could send her stumbling into trouble.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: A year after moving to Paris for her dream job, Emily arrives at a career and romantic crossroads that will force her to decide where her future lies.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Emily’s life in Paris may have beaucoup drama, but she’s ready to make bold choices to get everything she wants from the city — and man — of her dreams.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Now the head of Agence Grateau Rome, Emily faces professional and romantic challenges as she adapts to life in a new city.

tv_shows.tagline: The best journeys take unexpected turns.

last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter Eight: The Rightside Up
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Vecna prepares to destroy the world as we know it, the party must put everything on the line to defeat him once and for all.

tv_shows.overview: As a vicious drug dealer tries to overtake Marseille, a rogue police captain and his daredevil team welcome a new recruit with an agenda of her own.

last_episode_to_air.name: Queen Bee
last_episode_to_air.overview: As unsettling new evidence and hard truths come to light, both police and locals scramble to find those responsible — before it's too late.

tv_shows.name: Land of Sin
tv_shows.overview: When a teenager goes missing, a detective with personal ties to the case joins a tense investigation that reveals fierce loyalties and old family feuds.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Fighting for his love, Sang-ung goes toe-to-toe with the Mundane Vanguard. Will he and his friends finally become the heroes they were meant to be?

tv_shows.name: Cashero
tv_shows.overview: An ordinary man who inherits super strength discovers a greater evil out to steal his power. The one catch? Every use drains money from his wallet.
tv_shows.tagline: Burning salary to save lives. My cash, my power.
